title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2074/98 of 29 September 1998 adjusting the standard amount provided for in Council Regulation (EEC) No 1010/86 and setting the production refund on white sugar used in the chemical industry
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2074/98 of 29 September 1998 adjusting the standard amount provided for in Council Regulation (EEC) No 1010/86 and setting the production refund on white sugar used in the chemical industry
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following paragraph is added to Article 4a of Regulation (EEC) No 1010/86:
'1b. For the period 1 October 1998 to 30 September 2000 the standard amount referred to in paragraph 1 shall be reduced to ECU 6,45.`
The production refund for white sugar referred to in Article 4 of Regulation (EEC) No 1010/86 shall be ECU 41,963 per 100 kilograms net for the period 1 October to 31 December 1998.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 October 1998.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 September 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
